item.title: Synchronous and Asynchronous process
item.description: Real life examples Synchronous processing : Getting movie ticket from counter , Phone call , video conferencing. Asynchronous processing : Ordering food in restaurant , FTP , email , social media. Synchronous and Asynchronous process Synchronous processing : Synchronous execution means the execution happens in a single series. Single Thread |<---T1---->||<----T2---------->||<------T3----->| Multi Thread thread A -> |<---A---->| thread B ---------------->|<----B---------->| thread C ------------------------------------->|<------C----->| Asynchronous processing : Execution of a multiple process can happen without having dependency on each other.
